member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP
member.summary: This structure is used as an input and output buffer for the IOCTL_STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP.Version
member.summary: The version of this structure. This should be set to STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP_VERSION_V1.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP.Units
member.summary: The units of the MaxPower value, of type .

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_POWER_CAP.MaxPower
member.summary: Contains the value of the actual maximum power consumption level of the device. This may be equal to, less than, or greater than the desired threshold, depending on what the device supports.
